content: German Scholarship of University of Bremen
Semester abroad in Bangkok, Thailand. School of Architecture and Design, KMUTT
B. Sc. Digital Media, University of Bremen
M.A. Creative Technologies, Filmuniversity Babelsberg Konrad Wolf
Student assistant at the library of the University of Public Administration in Bremen
Short term holiday employment at the production of Daimler plant Bremen at the production area
Student assistent at International Office Bremen. Student Consultant for the Virtual Campus of the Young Universities for the Future of Europe (Yufe)
Seminar speaker at Informatica Feminale in Bremen with Ayla Satilsmis about 'Discrimination through Algorithms? - Ethical reflections on current challenges'
Research Assistent at FAST45 (Futures Art School Trends - 2045) at Filmuniversity Babelsberg Konrad Wolf
International Youth Voluntary Service with DJiA at German church community and senior residency at Mallorca, e.g leading of youth film project
Service worker at Open Caf√© at SOS Kinderdorf Bremen
PR and design managment for interdisciplinary Student Research Project FORAREX. Participation at European Research Project REXUS/BEXUS
